title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves: The Road to Neverwinter
description: Every adventuring party has a starting quest. Join Edgin Darvis and his team of heroic (well, occasionally heroic) heisters in this official prequel to the film Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves.A thrilling original novel, set before the events of Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves.
author: Jaleigh Johnson
